    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Chemistry of the Environment &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176534">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176534">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176534">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17176534">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Rachel Hamelers
           <br />
           phone: x 3601
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           IM (AIM):rachelhamelers
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17176534" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159734">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159734">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159734">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932507">
          <p>
           When searching for articles, you may find the
           <strong>
            full-text
           </strong>
           of an article
           <strong>
            linked
           </strong>
           in the database. If not:
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Most databases have a
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons. Click the link to check our holdings.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            If there is not a&nbsp;
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons,
            <strong>
             search
             <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
              Encompass
             </a>
            </strong>
            to see if we have access to the full text in print or through another database.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           If we do not have access to the article you need,
           <strong>
            request
           </strong>
           the article via
           <strong>
            Interlibrary Loan
           </strong>
           :
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases have a
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request on Interlibrary Loan
             </em>
            </strong>
            or
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request Item
             </em>
            </strong>
            link or button. Click here to fill out a request form.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If the database does not have an ILL link embedded, go to the Library Homepage -- Services --
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
             Interlibrary Loan
            </a>
            . Fill out the form. NOTE: Interlibrary Loan can take anywhere from a few day to a few weeks. Plan accordingly.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt16932507" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176537">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176537">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176537">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Environmental Science Journals and Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176537">
          <div id="boxatt17176537" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240322">
              <a id="link_20240322" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/loi/esthag" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240322,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240322}); ">
               Environmental Science and Technology
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240331">
              <a id="link_20240331" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=8gh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240331,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12833605}); ">
               GreenFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               GreenFile's resources focus on the ways humans affect the environment, providing indexing and some full text of scholarly and general interest items.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176538">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176538">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176538">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176538">
          <div id="boxatt17176538" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240348">
              <a id="link_20240348" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/cen/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240348,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378333}); ">
               Chemical and Engineering News
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "News edition" of the American Chemical Society
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240353">
              <a id="link_20240353" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240353,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240358">
              <a id="link_20240358" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240358,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176590">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176590">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176590">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176590">
          <div id="boxatt17176590" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240393">
              <a id="link_20240393" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.epa.gov/climatechange/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240393,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240393}); ">
               Environmental Protection Agency's Climate Change Website
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176539">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176539">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176539">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Databases for Scientific Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176539">
          <div id="boxatt17176539" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240413">
              <a id="link_20240413" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/action/showPublications?display=journals" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240413,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325172}); ">
               American Chemical Society Web Editions
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Abstracts and some full-text of peer-reviewed research journals in the chemical and related sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240427">
              <a id="link_20240427" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240427,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A service of the National Library of Medicine, includes over 14 million citations for biomedical articles back to the 1950's. These citations are from MEDLINE and additional life science journals. PubMed includes links to many sites providing full text articles and other related resources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240297">
              <a id="link_20240297" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240297,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Large and diverse database that covers most academic disciplines. Contains both scholarly and non-academic resources. Includes many articles in full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240418">
              <a id="link_20240418" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240418,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974075}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access search engine that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly" on the free web. Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Be sure to check library catalog to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240300">
              <a id="link_20240300" href="http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/advanced?sid=598a2239-0fec-45f7-bcff-e7ebc48e2b7c%40sessionmgr4002&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4112" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240300,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20240300}); ">
               OmniFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Multi-disciplinary database providing the complete content--indexing, abstracts, and full-text--from six of Wilson's full-text databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240298">
              <a id="link_20240298" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240298,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Searchable collections of full-text journals across many disciplines. Contains full-text of many biology, botany, ecology journal titles. (Note: To restrict results to particular journals/disciplines, from Advanced Search screen, choose discipline category/ies.)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240426">
              <a id="link_20240426" href="http://0-www.sciencedirect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240426,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974078}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This database includes 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health and life sciences. Coverage spans 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17176540">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176540">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176540">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176540">
          <div id="boxatt17176540" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20240525">
              <a id="link_20240525" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240525,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Credo Reference provides access to 325 reference works, including general and subject specific dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from over 60 respected publishers across 17 major subject areas--all online, all searchable from one search box.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20240533">
              <a id="link_20240533" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20240533,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Chemistry of the Environment', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4666815" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17176541">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17176541">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17176541">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17176541">
          <p>
           <strong>
            The ACS Style Guide: Effective Communication of Scientific Information
           </strong>
           - in Ready Reference - 808.06654 A187s
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17176541" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159736">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159736">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159736">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16932440">
          <p>
           Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           by filling out the appropriate form for
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
            articles
           </a>
           or
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=book">
            books
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16932440" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
